image_name.description: Name of the Docker image which may or may not include registry URL, tag, and digest value

run_as_user.description: Overrides image's default user, specified user UID must be an existing user in the image with a valid home directory

username.description: Username to use to fetch the Docker image

password.description: Password to use to fetch the Docker image

email.description: Email to use to fetch the Docker image

access-key.description: AWS access key for Amazon Elastic Container Registry (AWS ECR)

secret-key.description: AWS secret key for Amazon Elastic Container Registry (AWS ECR)

oidc-role.description: Provides Pipeline with access to private Docker images hosted in an Amazon Elastic Container Registry (AWS ECR)

max_time.description: Maximum amount of minutes a step can execute

size.description: Multiplier of the resources allocated to a pipeline step

clone_properties.description: Contains settings to clone the repository into a container

enabled.description: Enables cloning of the repository before a step in a pipeline

lfs.description: Enables the download of LFS files in the clone (supported only for Git repositories)

depth.description: Depth of Git clone (supported only for Git repositories)

skip-ssl-verify.description: Disables SSL verification during git clone, allowing the use of self-signed certificates

artifact_list.description: Files produced by a step to share with a following step

items.description: Glob pattern for the path to the artifacts

download.description: Enables downloading of all available artifacts at the start of a step

runner_label.description: Any label assigned to a self-hosted repository or workspace Pipeline runner

changesets.description: Condition on the changesets involved in a pipeline

includePaths.description: Condition which holds only if any of the modified files match any of the defined patterns

items.description: Glob pattern to match the file path

after-script.description: Commands to execute after the step succeeds or fails

deployment.description: Type of environment for the deployment step, used in the Deployments dashboard

fail-fast.description: A flag reflecting whether other steps in a parallel group should be force stopped if this step fails

oidc.description: Enable the use of OpenID Connect to connect a pipeline step to a resource server

oneOf.description: List of labels assigned to Pipeline runner

script.description: Commands to execute in the step

trigger.description: Specifies if a step runs automatically or only when manually triggered by a user

deployment.description: Type of environment for the deployment stage, used in the Deployments dashboard

steps.description: List of steps in a stage

trigger.description: Specifies if the stage runs automatically or only when manually triggered by a user

parallel_steps.description: Set of steps to run concurrently

fail-fast.description: A flag reflecting whether all steps in a parallel group should be force stopped if any of its steps fails.

variables.description: Environment variables passed to the pipe

cache_path.description: Path to the directory to be cached, can be absolute or relative to the clone directory

cache_with_key.description: Cache definition declaring a set of files as a key and path to the directory to be cached

items.description: Path to a file or glob pattern of files in the repository which form the cache key

definitions.description: Defines resources used elsewhere in the pipeline configuration

caches.description: Defines custom caches to be used by pipelines

services.description: Defines services that run in separate Docker containers

memory.description: Memory limit for the service container, in megabytes

variables.description: Environment variables passed to the service container

docker.description: A flag to add Docker to all build steps in all pipelines

custom.description: Pipelines that can only be triggered manually or scheduled from the Bitbucket Cloud interface

variables.description: List of variables for the custom pipeline

name.description: Name of a variable for the custom pipeline

default.description: Default value for the variable, used unless the value is manually set when the pipeline is run

allowed-values.description: A list of values that are allowed for the variable
